As a first step, I wish you would set down some of the thoughts you ex¬
pressed In Philadelphia re a federation structure. 1 am personally most in¬
terested In exploring such a possibility.
1 am confident that, as man concerned with advancing the cause of the
whole ETV movement, we can develop within the frame of the Association ways
and means to make the NAEB both responsive and affective in serving the needs
of ETV stations.
With warm personal regards.
Sincerely,
William G. Harley
WGH/mlg
BCC: Messrs, R. B. Hull
R. D.Hurlbeet
Ken Kager
